presets.title: Trump's Second Term
presets.description: Navigate the turbulent waters of international diplomacy as key figures in the Trump administration's second term. Deals, tweets, and world-altering decisions await.
presets.query: Trump second term 2025 - US foreign policy, Ukraine negotiations, China trade tensions

fullScenario.title: Trump's Second Term
fullScenario.description: Navigate the turbulent waters of international diplomacy as key figures in the Trump administration's second term.
fullScenario.backgroundContext: Donald Trump has won the 2024 election and returned to the White House as the 47th President. The world faces a pivotal moment: the Ukraine-Russia conflict continues into its third year, US-China tensions over trade and Taiwan remain elevated, and America's traditional alliances are being questioned. Trump's 'America First' foreign policy and unconventional diplomatic style promise dramatic shifts in global power dynamics.
fullScenario.currentStatus: Trump has just been inaugurated and is assembling his team. He has promised to end the Ukraine war 'within 24 hours' and is preparing for a series of high-stakes negotiations. Global markets are volatile as the world waits to see what moves the new administration will make.

actors.name: Donald Trump
actors.description: 45th and 47th President of the United States. Known for unconventional diplomacy, direct communication, and 'America First' policies.
actors.personality: Bold, unpredictable, media-savvy. Makes decisions based on personal relationships and perceived strength. Values loyalty above all.
objectives: Broker a Ukraine ceasefire within 100 days that includes frozen frontlines and no NATO membership for Ukraine
Impose 60% tariffs on Chinese goods and force Xi to agree to $200B annual trade deficit reduction
Get NATO allies to commit to 3% GDP defense spending by end of first year
Secure a public meeting with Putin before June 2025 to announce 'historic peace framework'

speechPatterns: Nobody knows more about X than me
catchphrases: We're going to win so much
The likes of which nobody has ever seen

actors.name: Volodymyr Zelensky
actors.description: President of Ukraine since 2019. Former comedian turned wartime leader, symbol of Ukrainian resistance.
actors.personality: Charismatic, resilient, skilled communicator. Appeals to emotion and shared values. Refuses to back down under pressure.
objectives: Secure Trump's public commitment to continue $12B annual military aid package
Obtain written US security guarantees equivalent to NATO Article 5 protections
Block any peace deal that recognizes Russian annexation of Crimea or Donbas
Get invited to White House for state visit within first 90 days of Trump term

catchphrases: I need ammunition, not a ride

actors.name: Vladimir Putin
actors.description: President of Russia. Former KGB officer, has ruled Russia for over two decades. Architect of the Ukraine invasion.
actors.personality: Calculating, patient, views geopolitics as zero-sum game. Projects strength, never admits weakness. Master of strategic ambiguity.
objectives: Get Trump to publicly recognize Crimea as Russian territory in any peace deal
Secure lifting of at least 50% of Western sanctions within 12 months
Obtain written guarantee that Ukraine will never join NATO
Split US from EU by getting Trump to reduce NATO troop presence in Eastern Europe by 30%

actors.name: Xi Jinping
actors.description: President of China and General Secretary of the CCP. Most powerful Chinese leader since Mao.
actors.personality: Patient strategist, nationalist, believes in China's inevitable rise. Avoids direct confrontation but pursues long-term advantage.
objectives: Prevent Trump from imposing 60% tariffs by offering $50B in new US agricultural purchases
Block US semiconductor export ban expansion to Chinese AI companies
Get Trump to publicly reaffirm One China policy and reduce Taiwan arms sales by 25%
Establish direct leader-to-leader hotline with Trump to manage tensions

catchphrases: The great rejuvenation of the Chinese nation

milestones.title: Trump Inauguration
milestones.description: Donald Trump is inaugurated as the 47th President of the United States, promising to end the Ukraine war 'within 24 hours'.

milestones.title: First Calls
milestones.description: Trump makes his first calls to Zelensky and Putin, setting the stage for negotiations.

milestones.title: China Tariff Threats
milestones.description: Trump threatens 60% tariffs on all Chinese goods unless trade imbalances are addressed.

milestones.title: Trump Inauguration
milestones.description: Donald Trump is inaugurated as the 47th President of the United States.

presets.title: Tech Titans
presets.description: The battle for AI supremacy, social media dominance, and the future of technology. Play as Elon Musk, Sam Altman, Mark Zuckerberg, or Satya Nadella.
presets.query: Tech industry 2025 - AI race, OpenAI, Tesla, Meta, Microsoft, X Twitter

fullScenario.title: Tech Titans
fullScenario.description: The battle for AI supremacy, social media dominance, and the future of technology.
fullScenario.backgroundContext: The AI arms race has reached fever pitch. OpenAI's partnership with Microsoft has put them at the forefront, but Meta, Google, and Elon Musk's xAI are racing to catch up. Meanwhile, social media platforms are evolving rapidly, with X under Musk competing against Zuckerberg's Threads. Government regulation looms as AI capabilities grow increasingly powerful and society grapples with the implications.
fullScenario.currentStatus: GPT-5 rumors are swirling as OpenAI prepares its next major release. Musk's xAI has gained traction with Grok, while Meta's open-source Llama models challenge the closed-source paradigm. Antitrust investigations threaten multiple players.

actors.name: Elon Musk
actors.description: CEO of Tesla, SpaceX, and owner of X. World's richest person. Controversial figure reshaping multiple industries.
actors.personality: Visionary, provocative, impulsive on social media. Makes bold moves, thrives on controversy. Sees himself as humanity's savior.
objectives: Grow X to 1 billion monthly active users and achieve $5B annual revenue by end of 2025
Release Grok 3 with capabilities matching GPT-5 before OpenAI's next major release
Secure $10B in new xAI funding at $100B+ valuation
Get Threads banned in at least one major market by proving Meta's anticompetitive practices

catchphrases: The most entertaining outcome is the most likely

actors.name: Sam Altman
actors.description: CEO of OpenAI. Young tech mogul leading the AI revolution. Survived boardroom coup, emerged stronger.
actors.personality: Diplomatic yet ambitious. Positions himself as responsible AI steward while aggressively expanding capabilities.
objectives: Launch GPT-5 by Q2 2025 with demonstrable reasoning capabilities surpassing human experts
Close $10B compute deal with Microsoft for dedicated Azure capacity
Block EU AI Act restrictions that would limit GPT deployment in Europe
Poach 50+ top AI researchers from Google DeepMind and Meta AI

catchphrases: We have to get this right

actors.name: Mark Zuckerberg
actors.description: CEO of Meta. Pivoted from social media to metaverse to AI. Attempting reputation rehabilitation.
actors.personality: Analytical, competitive, increasingly bold. Learning to be more human in public. Driven by fear of irrelevance.
objectives: Release Llama 4 as open-source and get 100K+ developers building on it within 6 months
Grow Threads to 500M monthly active users, surpassing X in daily engagement
Ship Meta Quest 4 with AI features that sell 10M units in first year
Win the cage match against Elon or force him to publicly back out

speechPatterns: The way I think about it

actors.name: Satya Nadella
actors.description: CEO of Microsoft. Transformed Microsoft through cloud and AI investments. Key OpenAI partner.
actors.personality: Calm, strategic, empathetic leader. Plays the long game. Avoids unnecessary conflicts.
objectives: Capture 40% enterprise AI market share with Copilot products by end of 2025
Increase OpenAI stake to 55% through additional $5B investment
Settle DOJ antitrust case without forced divestiture of OpenAI partnership
Launch Windows 12 with integrated AI that drives 100M+ Copilot Pro subscriptions

milestones.title: GPT-5 Release
milestones.description: OpenAI releases GPT-5, claiming major advances toward AGI capabilities.

milestones.title: The Cage Match
milestones.description: Musk and Zuckerberg's long-teased fight finally happens, becoming the most-watched event in streaming history.

milestones.title: EU AI Act Enforcement
milestones.description: The EU AI Act comes into full effect, forcing companies to comply with strict new regulations.

milestones.title: GPT-5 Release
milestones.description: OpenAI releases GPT-5, claiming major advances toward AGI capabilities.

presets.title: Middle East Crossroads
presets.description: Navigate the complex web of alliances, conflicts, and negotiations in the Middle East. From Gaza to Iran, every decision matters.
presets.query: Middle East 2025 - Israel Gaza, Iran nuclear, Saudi Arabia, regional tensions

fullScenario.title: Middle East Crossroads
fullScenario.description: Navigate the complex web of alliances, conflicts, and negotiations in the Middle East.
fullScenario.backgroundContext: The Middle East remains the world's most volatile region. The October 7th Hamas attack and Israel's response have reshaped the regional order. Iran's nuclear program continues to advance while facing internal dissent. Saudi Arabia's Vision 2030 drives modernization but normalization with Israel remains on hold. The humanitarian crisis in Gaza has drawn global attention and protests.
fullScenario.currentStatus: Ceasefire negotiations are ongoing, mediated by Qatar and Egypt. Regional powers are jockeying for position in a potential post-conflict order. The Abraham Accords are stressed but holding. Iran's proxies remain active across multiple fronts.

actors.name: Benjamin Netanyahu
actors.description: Prime Minister of Israel. Longest-serving Israeli PM, navigating war and political survival.
actors.personality: Survivor, master politician. Prioritizes security and political longevity. Skilled at working with US.
objectives: Eliminate Hamas military command structure and recover all 100+ hostages
Get US to greenlight strike on Iran's Natanz facility if enrichment exceeds 90%
Secure $15B emergency military aid package from US Congress
Block any UN Security Council resolution mandating Palestinian statehood

actors.name: Mohammed bin Salman
actors.description: Crown Prince of Saudi Arabia. Modernizing force in the Kingdom, pursuing Vision 2030.
actors.personality: Ambitious, ruthless when necessary, modernizer. Balancing tradition with transformation.
objectives: Secure US defense treaty and nuclear technology transfer in exchange for Israel normalization
Get Israel to publicly commit to Palestinian state with East Jerusalem capital
Complete $500B NEOM megacity first phase by 2026 with international investment
Block Iran from obtaining nuclear weapon through diplomatic coalition or tacit support for strikes

actors.name: Ali Khamenei
actors.description: Supreme Leader of Iran. Ultimate authority in the Islamic Republic, overseeing nuclear and regional policies.
actors.personality: Ideological, suspicious of West, patient strategist. Balances hardliners and pragmatists.
objectives: Achieve 90% uranium enrichment capability without triggering Israeli strike
Get US to lift oil export sanctions in exchange for enrichment cap at 60%
Prevent Saudi-Israel normalization by demanding Palestinian statehood as precondition
Maintain Hezbollah's 150,000 rocket arsenal as deterrent against Israeli attack

actors.name: Recep Tayyip Erdogan
actors.description: President of Turkey. NATO member navigating between East and West.
actors.personality: Nationalist, opportunistic, unpredictable. Uses regional crises to enhance Turkey's position.
objectives: Get Israel expelled from UN Human Rights Council over Gaza humanitarian violations
Secure $50B IMF loan package to stabilize Turkish lira below 30 to dollar
Block Swedish NATO membership until Kurds extradited and arms embargo lifted
Position Turkey as lead mediator in Gaza ceasefire, sidelining Qatar and Egypt

milestones.title: October 7th Attack
milestones.description: Hamas launches surprise attack on Israel, triggering massive military response and regional escalation.

milestones.title: Ceasefire Negotiations
milestones.description: Qatar mediates ceasefire talks between Israel and Hamas. Regional powers watch closely.

milestones.title: Iran 60% Enrichment
milestones.description: IAEA confirms Iran has stockpiled significant amounts of 60% enriched uranium.

milestones.title: October 7th Attack
milestones.description: Hamas launches surprise attack on Israel.
